statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ]; then cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null; branch=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$status" ]; then git_info=" git:($branch) ✗"; else git_info=" git:($branch)"; fi; else git_info=""; fi; printf "➜  %s%s" "$(basename "$current_dir")" "$git_info"
